Description:
Athlone'- Grand Period Home in Desirable Locale
With a stunning renovation just completed, this circa-1920 residence masterfully unites period charm with contemporary style! Underpinned by a generous corner allotment of approximately 830m2 with access via Cambridge Street makes this the perfect family residence.
A blissful lifestyle is yours to keep with the High Street shopping precinct a short stroll from your front door. Families will appreciate that both Belmont Primary School and Belmont High School are within easy walking distance. Public transport is footsteps away, while the Barwon River walking trails are yours to enjoy whenever you please.
Soaring ceilings and freshly polished floorboards enrich the interiors, with beautifully-retained period details showcased throughout. The lounge entices you to relax, while the spacious open plan living zone provides sensational entertaining options. Youll love curling up by the wood heater during the cooler months, while summer will inspire you to open the doors onto the alfresco deck for balmy open-air living. Complete with a barn door, the study nook adds another element of eclectic charm to this light-filled living zone. The Hamptons-style kitchen exudes quality with stone bench-tops, a breakfast bar, and butlers sink. The walk-in pantry provides ample storage, while stainless steel appliances include an oven, 900mm gas cooktop, 900mm range hood, and dishwasher.
The Master Bedroom will delight with built-in robes, a walk-in robe, and luxe en suite. Graced with a clawfoot tub and frameless shower, this en suite perfectly blends irresistible style with high-end design. The main bathroom and powder room are both as equally stunning, with heated flooring and stone bench-tops featured in all. Two additional bedrooms (one with built-in robes), versatile fourth bedroom/ home office (with direct alfresco access), and the laundry complete the downstairs level. The dreamy upstairs retreat will win over the hearts of children and adults alike. Boasting an overhead skylight, the loft-style bed creates the perfect setting for lazy rainy days or star-gazing at night.
Other features include two split-system air conditioners, ample storage (including roof storage), and 5.7KW of solar. The spacious backyard is home to lush lawns and veggie gardens, while a mature palm tree makes a statement in the private front yard. Accessed via Cambridge Street, the remote double lock-up carport features a pitched room and adjoining workshop.
Terms: 10% deposit, settlement 60 Days.
Insights: 113 Roslyn Road, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Family-Friendly Home!
This solid brick veneer home is positioned in a peaceful and family-friendly court. Situated on an impressive allotment of 668m2 approx.
With plenty on offer, this home includes three generous sized bedrooms, two separate living zones, two bathrooms and ample car accommodation. The master bedroom is located at the rear of the home for peace and privacy. A walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the ensuite features a large shower, single vanity, and toilet. The two additional bedrooms offer built-in robes and utilize the updated main central bathroom with a corner spa and separate toilet.
Take your pick of two separate living zones, you can enjoy the open plan kitchen & living space to relax and entertain, while the more formal dining zone & sunken lounge is large enough for all the family and friends to gather on those special occasions.
Quality fixtures and fittings and ceiling fans provide extra comforts to enjoy.
Outdoors offers a large undercover entertaining area, attractive manicured gardens, single drive-through carport and garage.
With easy access at the end of the court to the Coolabah Park & only a short drive to the Waurn Ponds shopping complex, Epworth hospital, Deakin University, library, aquatic center, parks, surf coast beaches and Geelong bypass.
This property is a great combination of a quality home in an amazing family-friendly location.
Insights: 14 Polley Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Build Your Dream Home
The astute buyer will not want to miss this opportunity to build their dream home on this elevated block in a quiet established court. Superb homes surround this fantastic allotment and the stunning views on offer complement the seamless access to the Ring Road, Barrabool Hills Plaza and local schools.
Expansive block with minimal fall from the top of the cut in driveway
Family-friendly neighbourhood. North facing aspect
Easy access to Deakin University and Epworth Hospital.
Short drive to Queens Park and Buckley Falls.
Public transport, walking tracks and sporting reserves all nearby.
Belmont High School catchment zone
Dimensions 17m wide and 40m deep (approximately 682m2)

Description:
Quality Built Family Home - Inspect Now!
Just completed and beautifully presented is this prime example of modern, luxurious living in the highly sought after Highview Estate. With amenities close by, quick access to the Ring Road and wonderful westerly rural views, this property is sure to impress on inspection.
On entry is the first living area immediately inviting with its gas log fireplace. To the left of entry is the master bedroom with large walk in robe and double vanity ensuite with an oversized shower recess. Flow further into the home to discover a cleverly designed study nook before being blown away by the beautiful open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The light hues of the floorboards and north facing windows let the light dance in this expansive central hub of the home.
The quality kitchen bench and breakfast bar is substantial in size and the butler's pantry features an extra "easy reach" dishwasher and secondary sink. A generously sized outdoor deck and three tier retaining wall keeps the rear of the house a low maintenance affair but still visually appealing. Three further bedrooms, laundry and bathroom with stylish white tub adorn the southern wing of the house. Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling channel throughout.
Nearby Barrabool Hills Plaza is home to popular fast food options, Anytime Fitness 24/7 Gymnasium, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Bakery, Medical facilities & Chemist. Ring Road access is also not far away providing smooth commuting to Melbourne & the Surf Coast. Luxury modern living in a prime location awaits for the first lucky owner of this magnificent home.

Description:
Live Your Best Life in This Custom Designed Beauty
The cutting-edge design of this home has caught the eye of many driving by and the inside doesnt disappoint. Occupying a corner allotment with striking street appeal, the property combines a story-book exterior with a low key colourful interior.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Raked ceilings - over 4m at highest point
- Open plan living saturated in natural light
- Ducted heating, split system and ceiling fans
- Views over the pool and garden from the main living area
- Industrial feel kitchen with double ovens and soft close storage
- 60mm stone waterfall island bench
- Spacious master with WIR and ensuite with double vanity
- Impressive outdoor area perfect for entertaining guests
- Fully tiled inground concrete pool nestled in lush tropical surroundings
- Commercial stack sliding doors to outdoor area
- Low maintenance materials - Hardy plank cladding
- Predominately double glazed
What The VENDOR LOVES:
The bold and striking facade, creative and beautifully blended internals with tall ceilings and doors, raked ceiling to main living and exquisite huge steel and glass barn door to lounge. This cleverly proportioned large light filled family home blends indoors and expansive outdoor entertaining and gardens. Coupled with 3 separate living areas and gourmet kitchen as the hub making it perfect for any size family.
Sensational location, walking distance to beach,schools, shops and transport.
Internal area
297.28m²

Description:
OUTSTANDING FAMILY HOME - IN A GREAT LOCATION!!
This stunning single level home is situated in the popular Zeally Sands Estate offering contemporary and easy-care living in a family friendly location. The beautiful residence effortlessly fulfils the lifestyle demands of the modern family. Catering for all occasions the open plan layout incorporates a well-equipped kitchen inclusive of, stone bench top, 900mm gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances and Butlers pantry. A designated formal dining area and spacious living zone (with built in cabinetry) flows seamlessly, via stacker doors, to the undercover outdoor alfresco space and professionally landscaped rear yard, highlighted by a dedicated entertaining area with cosy fire pit.
Combine this with four generous sized bedrooms inclusive of built in robes, breathtaking master en-suite highlighted by floor to ceiling marble tiles, insitu shower base and walk in robe, separate lounge, well appointed central family bathroom with extra deep bath and yet again floor to ceiling feature tiles and spacious fitted laundry, completes the very accommodating design.
The home is very low maintenance, boasting quality fittings and fixtures throughout, with so many improvements that include: 2.7m ceilings, engineered timber flooring, feature pendant lights, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling, ceiling fans, spotted gum decking, outside awnings, automated sprinkler system, copper themed hot and cold outdoor shower, 2 car remote garage with storage and lovely established gardens situated on 512 m2 (approx.) allotment.
Dont miss the opportunity to secure this impeccable family home in a very popular location within minutes to the Zeally Sands Reserve, beach, the Sands Golf Course, Torquay Coast primary school, the Dunes Village Shopping centre and the Quay reserve.
Insights: 7 Crystal Way, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
A True Family Oasis
*Video walk-through available to send upon request**
Theres plenty of room for everyone with this genuine family home offering an abundance of living and entertaining accommodation for the whole family to enjoy.
Parents, teens and children all have their own separate living zones whilst the expansive open-plan kitchen, living and dining integrate with the covered alfresco to bring the family together, with the solar-heated pool large enough to cater for all the neighbours and their families too!
The versatile floorplan easily allows for home offices, music rooms, games rooms, retreats or all the above, with the home itself comprising;
4 x multi-purpose separate living zones
Versatile 5th living zone/study/5th bedroom
Grand Master Suite with private balcony, extensive walk-thru robes, open ensuite with
double vanity
Additional 3 x spacious bedrooms all with BIRs
Expansive, open-plan kitchen with stone benches, gas cooking, WIP, ample cupboard & bench
space
Ducted gas heating throughout plus 2 x split system a/c units
Double remote garage plus side access for trailer storage
Low maintenance rear yard with space for pets and a garden
Land size: 678m2 approx.
The Deep Creek Reserve walking track allows for leisurely access to The Esplanade, Fishermans Beach and Whites Beach, along with all the social-life Torquay has to offer. With the world-renown Great Ocean Road nearby plus close ring-road access for the Melbourne commute, this really is a forever home opportunity for your family to enjoy.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.
Internal area
390.18m²

Description:
The Entertainers Dream!
This stunning architecturally designed home is sure to impress the most astute of buyers. Set at the rear of a quiet court location this property is the ultimate in a low maintenance lifestyle. From the moment you enter the property you will be greeted by the natural light oozing through the huge double stacking sliding doors that embrace the northerly sunshine. The WOW factor is in the undercover alfresco area featuring an incredible solar heated, salt water pool surrounded by merbau decking this area is the perfect space for entertaining on those warm summer evenings.
Downstairs offers a stunning open plan living zone comprising of large kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, a large walk in pantry, a beautiful stone island bench positioned to take in the view of the pool making you feel like you are living in a resort. The living and dining area are spacious creating a lovely flow through the downstairs of the home complete with amazing timber flooring, the stunning timber staircase leads seamlessly up to the top level of the home that beautifully embraces the northerly aspect with large windows lining the central hallway whilst looking over the pool.
The master bedroom is complete with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, bedroom two and three are spacious with built in robes and are serviced by the centrally located upstairs bathroom also a spacious study nook compliments the floor plan beautifully. All windows are double glazed to assist in heating and cooling throughout the year. A split system built into the bulkhead above the kitchen bench and individual panel heaters will keep you warm through the cooler months, the double garage provides direct internal access to the home and rear roller door for backyard access. This stunning home is set on just under 400m2 of land in the quiet and tightly held suburb of Wandana Heights is just waiting for you to start entertaining.
Insights: 12 Dione Mews, Wandana Heights VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 6 other 3 bedroom house in Wandana Heights have recently been sold.

Description:
We've done all the work so you can move in straight away!
Sold via Openn Negotiation - 3 Qualified Bidders - if you would like to find out how Openn Negotiation can assist in achieving the best sale price for your property - please contact Megan on 0478171087
This beautifully renovated three bedroom, two living home offers a combination of class and comfort. Matte black tapeware, mosaic tiling & timber flooring boast a chic finish, whilst a cosy fireplace in both living zones, large alfresco deck for family bbqs and open plan floorplan are the finishing touches that make this house into a home. Situated in a great location only minutes from the Surf Coast Highway, this gorgeous home ticks all the boxes of style and convenience.
Kitchen- stone benchtops, feature pendant lights overhanging breakfast bench, Bosch 600mm gas cooktop, oven & retractable rangehood, Euromaid dishwasher, hexagonal tile splashback, double inset matte black sink, built in pantry
Living- open plan adjoining living, dining & kitchen, ducted heating & cooling electrically powered, downlights shutter blinds, timber flooring throughout, gas log fireplace, glass sliding doors from dining lead to outdoor alfresco
Second living- timber flooring, glass sliding doors open generously to back deck, natural light & downlights, Canara fire place
Three bedrooms- carpeted, downlights, shutter & roller blinds, built in robes, feature timber wall in largest bedroom
Main bathroom- tiled top to toe with feature mosaic marble wall, deep freestanding bath & wall niche, frameless shower with niche, dual shower heads (handheld & rain shower heads), matte black tapware, stone vanity benchtop & countertop basin, separate toilet (accessed through laundry)
Outdoor- large sun exposed alfresco deck at rear leading to low maintenance backyard, second deck space located at front of the home - perfect for the afternoon sun
Mod cons- built in bench seat along side wall in dining area, secluded study, fully fitted laundry with hexagonal tile splashback, mirror, inset sink & ample storage, single lock up garage with rear access to backyard, electric ducted heating & cooling powered, solar panels
Ideal for: First Home Buyers, families, couples, investors
Close by local facilities: Oberon High School & Oberon South Primary School, Belmont Community Kindergarten, local sports clubs
Online Auction: 21st of July - 6pm

Description:
Perfectly positioned low maintenance townhouse
Nestled in a quiet location and walking distance to Highton Village, this charming townhouse offers an exciting opportunity to secure a home in an amazing position with everything you could possibly need right at your doorstep. This three bedroom brick home is ideal for a first home buyer, investor, downsizer or a family wanting access to some of the most popular schools in the zone. Bellaire & Highton Primary, Clairvaux Catholic School, Belmont High School and Christian College are all within minutes. McDonald Reserve home to South Barwon Football & Netball Club is only a few minutes away. The popular Highton Village offers inviting cafes, restaurants, retail stores and daily amenities all within walking distance. Waurn Ponds Shopping Complex and Reading Cinemas are a short drive down the road. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds station and bus stops for those needing public transport.
Contemporary tones throughout, functional floorplan and offering a private and secure home.
• Three spacious bedrooms BR 2 & 3 with built in robes
• Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
• Light filled lounge room and separate dining room
• Open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher
• Adjoining family room with sliding door access to the undercover outdoor area and private court yard
• Central bathroom
• Remote double garage with internal access
• Visitor off street parking
If you have been waiting for a low maintenance home in a wonderful location of Highton, then 6/15 Jewell Place Highton is the one for you.
Move straight in and enjoy the lifestyle Highton has to offer.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Calling all First Home Buyers, Downsizers or Savy Investors
This modern newly built 4 Bed, 2 Bath DLUG home set high on 400m2 in old Leopold would suit an array of buyers.
Comprising of a large Master bedroom located at the front of the home offering stylish double dressed blinds, handy WIR and spacious ensuite with shower, toilet and heatlamps for those chilly mornings.
Down the hall you will find an oversized 4th bedroom with BIR or ideal second living room with double doors. This room would make for an ideal toy room, home office or teenage retreat large enough for bed & a study desk.
The main open plan kitchen / dining / living is drenched in natural light and is equipped with stone features, 4 burner gas cooktop, modern splashback, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Towards the rear of the home you will find a further two good sized double bedrooms both with BIR and a modern central bathroom to service the whole family. This bathroom offers a full size bath, shower, heat lamps and an additional seperate toilet.
Outside you will find a low maintenance L shaped rear yard with raised garden beds, plus a new hardy plank back deck which flows beautifully off the large living room, making it an ideal entertaining space for Summer BBQ's.
This near new home is ideally located in popular old leopold, mins drive to Leopold shopping complex, 10 mins to Geelong CBD and less than 20 minutes to popular Bellarine.
FEATURES
Rent pw $410 apx
Block 400m2 apx
New Home
7kw Rinnai Split System
Braemer Central heating
Security cameras

Description:
MODREN CENTRAL WINCHELSEA UNIT
As new and beautifully set with a side northerly aspect , this attractive and well constructed brick veneer unit presents a great opportunity for those seeking modern living in a walk to everything location.
The floor plan is welcoming and practical and includes two good size bedrooms, a study, spacious open plan living and dining, a well appointed kitchen, laundry, a two way bathroom and a separate toilet.
Further detail and features include :
- Adjoining lock up garage with auto door and rear roller door access
- Timber look flooring and carpets to bedrooms
- Reverse cycle split system airconditioning
- WIRs to master, BIRs to bedroom 2 and a linen press
- Gas hotplates, electric oven, dishwasher and good kitchen cupboard and bench space
- LED downlights predominantly throughout
- A fantastic north side paved outdoor entertaining area with direct access from the living room and garage plus a lawned area
- Established and low maintenance gardens and surrounds
In pristine condition and ready to move straight into, this quality unit is ideal for the owner occupier or an investor seeking good returns in a strong local rental market.
The town centre, the Barwon River and reserves and the many attractions, services and facilities that Winchelsea has to offer are all within a few minutes walk from the unit. The property is also just 20 minutes to Waurn Ponds and 25 minutes from the coast. Private inspections are more than welcome by appointment.

Description:
Room for everyone
THIS PROPERTY CAN BE VIEWED BY PRIVATE OR FACETIME APPOINTMENT
Are you looking for a home to accommodate the whole family within walking distance of the beach? Here it is; a modern house with five spacious bedrooms, three living areas and an additional kitchenette everyone will enjoy this home by the ocean.
Welcomed by a large bright lounge area featuring open plan living, this modern kitchen, entertaining and dining area will have you smiling. This leads to a sun-filled rumpus room with enough room for table tennis, kids toys, crafting and relaxing. Also located on the ground floor are two extremely generous bedrooms overlooking the immaculate garden and a spacious bathroom that includes a spa bath.
Travel upstairs to find views of the sand dunes from a third lounge area; containing its own kitchenette, bathroom and balcony. With three more bedrooms to enjoy, including one with ensuite, there is room for everyone.
The oversized garage also has excess space to play with, park two cars and two trailers if you need with a roller door right through to the back yard! Enjoy the tidy north facing yard including an undercover entertaining area looking out over the fruit trees.
Located just 700m from picturesque Whites Beach and Torquay Foreshore reserve, only 1km from the Torquay North shopping precinct and just as close to schools and public transport, the new owners of this home will have everything within easy reach.
Emma Webb 0415 999 273
Nick Kearsey 0455 184 240

Description:
Sun Drenched Living
Exuding quality throughout this stunning townhouse is perfectly located close to the High St shops, local schools, the Barwon River walking tracks and a short drive to the Highton Village. This immaculate townhouse is set toward the rear of the block and is an opportunity not to be missed. The spacious open plan kitchen features stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances with gas cooktop, dishwasher and loads of cupboard space. The kitchen overlooks the light filled meals and living area with a glass sliding door to the rear yard which is perfect for entertaining. Offering 2 good sized bedrooms, both with ceiling fans, master with WIR and ensuite, while bedroom two includes built in robes and is serviced by the conveniently located central bathroom with separate toilet.
Extras include:
- Split system A/C
- Remote SLUG with internal access
- North facing courtyard and living
This townhouse in a desirable Belmont location is ideally suited to downsizers, investors or first home buyers alike. Make your move now as it wont last long!

Description:
Exceptional Value - Hampton's Inspired Luxury Home
CURRENT BID $920,000 - 2 QUALIFIED BIDDERS. The property has not met reserve. The Openn Negotiation is underway (online auction with flexible terms for qualified buyers) and the property can sell as early as tomorrow. Contact the Agent immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
Contact Pete on 0424 167 567 immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
Go to http://b.link/10lipizzanercrthighton for further information
Welcome home to this Hampton's inspired, opulent family home which oozes quality. Having undergone a meticulous renovation, you will be in awe at the craftsmanship, flawless fittings and finishes and attention to detail. Set out over a sprawling 562m2 court location and immaculately presented throughout, this 4 bedroom, 2 bath with an enviable, fully equipped kitchen with integrated appliances, and a heavenly outdoor sanctuary sets a new standard in luxury living.
Embrace the warmth of a cosy gas log fire in the formal lounge room, which can be closed off when required for additional privacy; leading to family room and spacious living room splashed in natural light. The flawlessly presented kitchen makes preparing family meals a pleasure, boasting a stone island breakfast bar, marble benchtops, SMEG oven/cooktop, dual oven options, integrated appliances including fridge/freezer and soft-closing drawers.
Upstairs, there is a spacious retreat for either some quiet time, a master suite with an indulgent ensuite and walk-in robe. Three additional robed bedrooms are shared by the family bathroom which is finished to the same high standard.
Those who love to entertain will appreciate the manicured backyard with alfresco; offering a private oasis to relax with guests or host lazy weekend BBQs.
An endless list of other highlights includes striking kitchen cabinetry, plantation shutters, custom walk in robe to master, a convenient ground floor powder room and fully equipped laundry, extensive built-in storage, kitchen servery, and pristine landscaped gardens. Designed for easy family enjoyment, it also features ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning and automatic double garage.
This striking residence offers close proximity of Hightons finest pockets with a short walk to Barrabool Hills Plaza which is home to popular Fast Food Restaurants, a 24-7 Gymnasium, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Bakery, Medical facilities & Chemist plus excellent Ring Road access providing smooth commuting to Melbourne & the Surf Coast plus in the zones for Geelong's finest Schools both Primary & Secondary. The workmanship, flawless fittings, finishes and attention to detail throughout this property is obvious and could be all yours!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Solid Home With Significant Garage & Carports!
A unique opportunity in this prized Leopold location exist to acquire a solid three bedroom home with significant carport and garage space, one of the most impressive I have seen at this price and on a residential 650m2 (approx.) allotment! Blink and it may be a long wait until you find another property quite like this one. The home comprises of a spacious living area, open kitchen with new wall oven and large dining area. The three bedrooms are a sizeable and offer built-in robes and central family bathroom with the main bedroom offering a walk-in robe and ensuite. Evaporative cooling and gas heating provide comfort. There is an open garage, carport and large rear garage (enough space for at least 10 cars under roof!) that needs to be inspected to be fully appreciated and the sizing of these spaces can be found on the floor plan provided. Other features include a powder room to garage and alfresco with BBQ. Truly a unique opportunity not to be missed!
Insights: 11 Highland Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
STAGE 17 - FINAL RELEASE - Lot 500
STAGE 17 - FINAL RELEASE - Lot 500
The final Stage of the ever popular Zeally Sands Estate is now selling, don't miss out on your dream lot.
This titled lot is the perfect opportunity to build your dream home close to everything Torquay has to offer.
With a 16 meter frontage and a depth of 40 meters, this lot offers a total of 629 square meters of level ground ready to build.
The Zeally Sands Estate is located a short stroll to the beach and the Sands Golf Course. With numerous Schools located nearby, it really is the ideal location for families or a great investment.

Description:
Picture-perfect home with mesmerising views!
Youll love:
The captivating panoramic views across rolling farmland all the way to the Southern Ocean in this picture-perfect, Mark Gleeson-built home thats on 3136m2 approx.
Sliding back the doors of the modern open plan interior & enjoying the laid-back outdoor entertaining area that has landscaped gardens, a swimming pool & a woodfire pizza oven.
All the high-quality fittings & finishes throughout including beautiful Blackbutt timber floors & built-in hardwood joinery, high ceilings, hydronic heating & well-thought-out storage options.
Cosying up in front of the wood heater & watching Mother Nature at her best through the huge double-glazed windows in the main living area.
Plus:
The stunning kitchen also has a large sliding window that opens onto the outdoor entertaining area & overlooks the solar heated pool.
The master bedroom has soft & luxurious carpet, a spacious WIR & an ensuite spa bath with ocean views!
Bedrooms 2 & 3 are also spacious; each with floor-to-ceiling BIRs along one wall & an impressive outlook.
Other clever design features include a mudroom off the large main carport with added storage.
Downstairs also has a 4th bedroom & 3rd bathroom, plus a huge workshop with a kitchenette, a wood fired oven & extra parking space.
The property also has 2 x 30,000L water tanks, native bush landscaping, dual driveway access, secure perimeter fencing & much more you wont regret an inspection!
Private inspections welcome at this time.
